claim_card.claim: The strongest and most persistent observed-vs-Gaussian cohort separation appears in the morphology-sensitive diagnostics D1_L2 and Z_mf across lmax ∈ {128, 192, 256, 320}.
claim_card.test_hook: Recompute D1_L2 and Z_mf across the same lmax sweep using the published pipeline and verify that observed values remain strongly separated from Gaussian control cohort means.

source.note: Decision-block comparison and narrative results sections
